text: Depends. If you have CRMC  Maybank fnf or other rewards credit cards  go for Amaze. Otherwise go for Youtrip
Cos of the points? Currency exchange rates same as youtrip?
Amaze's exchange rate is worse than YouTrip. However with Amaze you can earn credit card points. So pick your poison.
overall Amaze better 4mpd or 8%  no fx fees  get instapoint equivalent to 1%  but slightly worse foreign exchange

hello all  any comments on CardUp? i want to try to use it to pay my school fees next time  pairing it with my Amex card to earn miles. i cant use my Amex card directly to pay sch fees as it is not a supported card for payment
Amex fees are quite expensive  maybe consider using a different MC or visa

i saw that Amex on CardUp is having a promo on fees (1.6% for first time & 1.9% for subsequent). the potential miles to be earned outweighs the fees in my opinion
will give it a shot once & see how it is

New to the SC smart credit card. Anyone knows what is the smallest denomination for exchanging the rewards points to cashback? How much must u spend to redeem the cashback?
2 500 SCB points minimum plus $25+ for 1 000 Qantas points3 200 SCB points for $10 cashback
Yes. SCB cards pool with Smart cards. If you have Visa Infinite cards 2 500 points can be redeemed for 1 000 KrisFlyer points/miles. You can only do the redemption via desktop.
3 500 SCB points to 1 015 miles.
